alert.note: Alert for Brown; Eastern Cherry; Keya Paha (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Cherry, northwestern Brown and southwestern Keya Paha Counties through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1115 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Norden to 19 miles southeast of Littleburg to 12 miles southeast of Valentine. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Springview, Norden, Meadville, North River Trail and Bobcat State Wildlife Management Area. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 126 and 220. Highway 20 between mile markers 210 and 211. Highway 12 between mile markers 20 and 50. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
